GM: Can the child roll over from tummy to back?
Can the child sit with support?
FM: Can the child reach and grasp a toy?
Can the child transfer object from one hand to another?
LC: Does the child respond to familiar voice?
Does the child make repetitive sounds (ba/ma)?
COG: Does the child track moving objects?
Does the child show curiosity for nearby objects?
SE: Does the child smile at familiar people?
Does the child calm when comforted?

GM: Can the child stand with support?
Can the child crawl or move forward?
FM: Can the child pick small objects using fingers?
Can the child bang two objects together?
LC: Does the child respond to own name?
Does the child imitate simple sounds?
COG: Does the child find hidden objects?
Does the child follow one-step gesture commands?
SE: Does the child show preference for caregivers?
Does the child show social smile often?

GM: Can the child walk without support?
Can the child squat and stand back up?
FM: Can the child stack at least 2 blocks?
Can the child scribble with crayon?
LC: Does the child say at least 3 meaningful words?
Does the child respond when called by name?
COG: Does the child point to objects when named?
Does the child follow simple one-step instructions?
SE: Does the child make eye contact during interaction?
Does the child engage in simple social play?

GM: Can the child kick a ball forward?
FM: Can the child turn pages one by one?
Can the child draw simple vertical lines?
LC: Does the child combine two words?
Does the child identify familiar objects by name?
COG: Can the child sort objects by shape or color?
Does the child complete simple matching tasks?
SE: Does the child play beside other children?
Does the child show varied emotions appropriately?

GM: Can the child climb stairs with alternating feet?
Can the child jump with both feet?
FM: Can the child copy a circle?
Can the child use spoon with minimal spilling?
LC: Does the child speak in short sentences?
Can unfamiliar adults understand most words?
COG: Can the child identify basic colors?
Can the child follow two-step commands?
SE: Does the child share toys occasionally?
Does the child engage in pretend play?
